detailed_summary:
### Summary of Corporate Disclosure Document

#### Purpose and Nature of the Disclosure
The document serves as a formal notice regarding a scheduled meeting of the Board of Directors of Ellah Lakes Plc. It also announces the commencement of a closed trading period in compliance with regulatory requirements.

#### Key Dates
- **Board Meeting Date:** Tuesday, 22nd October 2019
- **Time of Meeting:** 11:00 AM
- **Closed Period Commencement:** 7th October 2019
- **Closed Period End:** 24 hours after the filing of the Company’s Audited Financial Statements with The Nigerian Stock Exchange.

#### Financial Statements
The Board will consider the audited financial statements of Ellah Lakes Plc for the financial year ended 31st July 2019 during the meeting.

#### Regulatory Compliance
The notice is in accordance with:
- **Rule 17.18(b) of the Rulebook of The Nigerian Stock Exchange, 2015 (Issuers’ Rules)**

#### Closed Period Details
- The closed period prohibits:
  - Directors
  - Persons discharging managerial responsibilities
  - Advisers of the Company
  - Connected persons
- These individuals are restricted from dealing in the securities of Ellah Lakes Plc during the closed period.

#### Company Information
- **Company Name:** Ellah Lakes Plc
- **Head Office Address:** No. 12 Ihama Road, G.R.A, Benin City, Edo State
- **Website:** www.ellahlakes.com
- **Company Secretary:** OAKE Legal

#### Conclusion
The notice is dated 8th October 2019 and is issued by the Company Secretary, OAKE Legal, on behalf of the Board of Directors of Ellah Lakes Plc.
